aliasDescription: Environment Alias matching the target Org and the settings file
artifactDirectoryMetadataFlagDescription: Optional directory if deployed src is unpacked from artifact
directoryMetadataFlagDescription: Directory to file or folder containing the file(s) to be changed
placeholderMetadataFlagDescription: Name of the placeholder inside the XML that should be replaced
valueMetadataFlagDescription: value used to replace the placeholder
targetOrgFlagDescription: username or alias for the target org
nameFlagDescription: Required Developer Name To Select Correct Data For Update
nameFlagDescription_namedCredential: Required Developer Name To Select Correct Data For Update
nameFlagDescription_authprovider: Required Developer Name To Select Correct Data For Update
nameFlagDescription_datasource: Required Developer Name To Select Correct Data For Update
nameFlagDescription_remotesite: Required Developer Name To Select Correct Data For Update
nameFlagDescription_custommetadata: Required Object Name xxx__mdt To Select Correct Data For Update
nameFlagDescription_customsetting: Required Object Name xxx__c To Select Correct Data For Update
developerFlagDescription_custommetadata: Required Developer Name xxx__mdt To Select Correct Data For Update
callbackFlagDescription_connectedapp: Optional Flag For Update Callback Url
typeFlagDescription: API Name of custom Metadata Object
keyFlagDescription_custommetadata: Required Flag For Custom Metadata Key
valueFlagDescription_custommetadata: Optional Flag For Custom Metadata Value Update
keyFlagDescription_customsetting: Required Flag For Custom Setting Field Key
valueFlagDescription_customsetting: Optional Flag For Custom Setting Value Update
errorNoCredentialsResults_namedCredentia: No results found for the org '%s' and Developer Name '%s'. Please Check Your Tags Or Create a New Credential in Org.
errorNoMetadataResults_namedCredential: No Metadata found in Source Path Packages For Credential Name '%s'. Please Check your Packages for the correct Named Credential Name
errorNoMetadataResults_metadata: No Metadata found in Org For Object Name '%s' and Developer Name '%s'
errorNoMetadataResults_customsetting: No Custom Settings found in Org For Object Name '%s' and Developer Name '%s'
errorMetadataUpdate_namedCredential: Metadata Update For '%s' throws an Error. Please Check your Packages and try again
errorReadAuth_authprovider: Read Retrieved Metadata for file '%s' throws an Error. Please Check your Repo and try again
errorReadDataSource_datasource: Read Retrieved Metadata for file '%s' throws an Error. Please Check your Repo and try again
errorReadNamedCredential_namedCredential: Read Retrieved Metadata for file '%s' throws an Error. Please Check your Repo and try again
errorReadRemoteSite_remotesite: Read Retrieved Metadata for file '%s' throws an Error. Please Check your Repo and try again
errorReadData: Read Retrieved Metadata for file '%s' throws an Error. Please Check your Repo and try again
examples_namedCredential: eon update:namedcredentials --targetusername myOrg@example.com --name xx_mule --password xxx --alias staging
examples_authprovider: eon update:authprovider --targetusername myOrg@example.com --name xx_auth --token xxx --alias staging
examples_datasource: eon update:datasource --targetusername myOrg@example.com --name my_datasource --endpoint xxx --alias staging
examples_remotesite: eon update:remotesite --targetusername myOrg@example.com --name my_page --url xxx --alias staging
examples_connectedapp: eon update:connectedapp --targetusername myOrg@example.com --name my_app --callback xxx --alias staging
examples_customlabel: eon upsert:customlabel --targetusername myOrg@example.com --name my_label --value xxx --alias staging
examples_custommetadata: eon update:custommetadata --targetusername myOrg@example.com --name my_label --key my_key --value my_value --alias staging
eon update:custommetadata --targetusername myOrg@example.com -n my_label -k XXX -v xxx
examples_customsetting: eon update:customsetting --targetusername myOrg@example.com --name my_object__c --key my_column --value my_value --alias staging
eon update:customsetting --targetusername myOrg@example.com -n my_object__c -k XXX -v xxx
